articles.title: Bitcoin below $20,000 after Jackson Hole caution - Economic Times
articles.description: Money is flowing out of risky assets. Crypto followed the sharp adjustment of the US stock market,  after Powell's remarks, said Cici Lu, CEO at Venn Link Partners.  Markets didn't like what he had to say and Bitcoin is resuming as a high-beta asset.
articles.content:
Bitcoin fell below $20,000 on Sunday as part of a wider cryptocurrency-market retreat, amid concern about the Federal Reserve's rate-hike path.
The largest token was trading at 19,999 at 22.30 IST S… [+1312 chars]
